mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY ( company_name, company_no, addr, phoneno, master, master_email, master_phoneno, reg_dt, mod_dt, del_yn, company_type ) VALUES( #{company_name}, #{company_no}, #{addr}, #{phoneno}, #{ master }, #{ master_email }, #{ master_phoneno }, NOW(), NOW(), 'N', 'CP' )
